div.p: Building something you love. Working on your own terms. Your dream startup idea shouldn't be limited to your dreams.

p.strong: It's time you make it a reality.

div.p: From idea to marketing, this course will guide you through all the nuances of idea selection, finding your founding team, raising the funds, building your first product, pricing it, and finding your first 1000 customers.

That's not all – through approaches, frameworks, and practical assignments, you'll also have an actionable plan to handle complex decisions in your startup journey. Through expert insights and proven strategies, you'll be equipped with the knowledge and mindset to navigate the startup ecosystem confidently.
